EmailTemplate.name: 202008_Americas_ATR_Avionics-and-Lighting_On24_Webinar.Sorry We Missed You!
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Did you miss our webinar? Sorry we missed you, {{lead.First Name:default=customer}}!
Since you couldn’t make our webinar, it’s now on-demand <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/hu53iywZjgdK4NQNK8iX1X?]]>, should you like to view it. Please use code 08192020.
If you'd like to view our presentation from the Avionics and Lighting Airline Operators webinar, check it out here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-Americas-ATR-Conference-Presentation.pdf]]>.
Stay in the loop with us and you’ll be among the first to learn about upcoming webinars, events, product launches and more. Sign up here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]>.
We look forward to seeing you next time!
Thank you, Honeywell Aerospace WATCH NOW <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/hu53iywZjgdK4NQNK8iX1X?]]>
